name: boot_room
description:
A visual novel where you type commands on a terminal to progress.

This was originally released for the Chronicles GameDev Challenge #3, but due to an unfortunate file operation, I lost all of my game dialog files.

I fixed it and now you're able to play it as it was supposed to be played a week ago.

Instructions:

Use UP and DOWN to choose your text and the RETURN key to validate.

Fan static noise by dklon
